30000.name: Shattered Throne - Fractured Causeway
30000.description: Black basalt plates buckle beneath your boots over a split imperial banner hangs in midair, trapped in a tear of violet light. The fortress ahead is cracked like glass, its edges drifting in slow, impossible arcs.

south.description: A slanted ramp descends south toward the outer ward.

west.description: The iris-gate of the Black Observatory glows to the west.

30001.name: Shattered Throne - Bonebreaker Gate
30001.description: A jagged portcullis of fused bone and iron stands open over shards of marble drift above a chasm. The air thrums with a choir of fractured reality.

east.description: A fractured arcade runs east between cracked pillars.

south.description: A debris-strewn path dips south into the ward.

west.description: A bonebridge rattles west toward the Crown of Bone.

30002.name: Riven Courtyard
30002.description: A courtyard of split flagstones is frozen mid-collapse over statues of emperors hang in the air, their faces erased by voidlight. The wind smells of ozone and old incense.

east.description: A corridor of fractured marble continues east.

south.description: Steps broken by gravity lean south into the ward.

west.description: The bonebreaker gate lies back to the west.

30003.name: Rift-Split Arcade
30003.description: Cracked columns rise in uneven rows over a glowing fissure threads through the floor like molten glass. Distant thunder pulses from somewhere beyond the walls.

east.description: An imperial arcade stretches east beneath shattered vaults.

south.description: A fractured stair leads south into deeper ruin.

west.description: The riven courtyard opens to the west.

30004.name: Imperial Barricades
30004.description: Collapsed barricades of black iron choke the passage over flickering wards stutter across their surfaces. The air tastes metallic, as if the world itself is bleeding.

east.description: A torn parade lane runs east past the barricades.

south.description: A ramp slides south into the inner ward.

west.description: The rift-split arcade lies to the west.

30005.name: Torn Parade Ground
30005.description: A long parade ground is split by a jagged chasm over banners flutter without wind, caught in time. The fortress walls groan with distant strain.

east.description: The broken march continues east along the wall.

south.description: A shattered stair drops south into a reinforced corridor.

west.description: The imperial barricades loom to the west.

30006.name: Nullwind Bastion
30006.description: A bastion of star-metal juts over the void over a windless gale presses at your skin, heavy with arcane static. The stones here hum with warding power.

east.description: The bastion narrows east toward the break.

south.description: A narrow stair drops south into a rift-lit hall.

west.description: The parade ground lies back to the west.

30007.name: Edge of the Break
30007.description: The fortress ends in a jagged cliff over a canyon of fractured reality boils beneath, flashing with impossible colors. The cold here is absolute.

south.description: A broken stair spirals south into the inner keep.

west.description: The nullwind bastion stretches back west.

30008.name: Outer Ward - Shardwatch
30008.description: A ring of cracked watchtowers leans inward over broken mirrors of obsidian reflect a sky split in two. The floor trembles with distant footsteps.

north.description: The fractured causeway rises back north.

east.description: A guardwalk runs east along the ruined wall.

south.description: A stair drops south into the inner ward.

30009.name: Outer Ward - Collapse Gallery
30009.description: Stone ribs jut from the walls over a gallery of collapsed murals depicts a coronation frozen mid-shatter. Dust hangs in slow spirals.

north.description: The bonebreaker gate lies back to the north.

east.description: A slanted hallway continues east into the ward.

south.description: A fractured arch falls south into a shadowed hall.

west.description: The shardwatch ring opens to the west.

30010.name: Outer Ward - Gravemark Stairs
30010.description: Broken stairs float inches above the ground over a violet seam runs along the ceiling, leaking cold light. Echoes feel heavy, as if weighed down.

north.description: The riven courtyard lies back north.

south.description: A reinforced doorway sinks south into a guard hall.

west.description: The collapse gallery opens to the west.

30011.name: Outer Ward - Rifted Hall
30011.description: A jagged split runs the length of the hall over stones on either side move at different speeds, like mismatched clocks. The smell of ozone thickens.

north.description: The rift-split arcade lies back north.

south.description: A wide stair descends south into a strategic chamber.

west.description: The gravemark stairs rise to the west.

30012.name: Outer Ward - Rupture Armory
30012.description: Racks of cracked weapons lean against the walls over armor plates float in midair, slowly rotating. The temperature drops with each breath.

north.description: The imperial barricades lie back north.

south.description: A reinforced threshold sinks south into the inner keep.

west.description: The rifted hall opens to the west.

30013.name: Outer Ward - Broken Bastion
30013.description: A bastion wall has sheared away over a red horizon flickers beyond, cut into thin slices of light. The stones here vibrate underfoot.

north.description: The torn parade ground lies back north.

south.description: A darkened stair falls south into the keep.

west.description: The rupture armory lies to the west.

30014.name: Outer Ward - Riftguard Steps
30014.description: Heavy steps lead toward a central shaft over wards are carved into the walls, each one split down the middle. A steady drumbeat echoes.

north.description: The nullwind bastion lies back north.

east.description: The steps continue east toward a breach in the keep.

south.description: A narrow stair drops south into the lower halls.

west.description: The broken bastion opens to the west.

30015.name: Outer Ward - Breachpoint
30015.description: A yawning rupture splits the wall over fragments of the keep drift in slow orbit. A long shadow moves behind the rift, watching.

north.description: The edge of the break lies back north.

south.description: A fractured passage drops south into the inner sanctum.

west.description: The riftguard steps lead back west.

30016.name: Inner Ward - Shattered Drill Hall
30016.description: A vast hall of cracked tiles echoes with phantom marching over broken helms hang in midair like a frozen storm. The air is sharp and cold.

north.description: The shardwatch ring lies back north.

south.description: A black stair descends south into the throne complex.

30017.name: Inner Ward - Riftforge Gallery
30017.description: A gallery of shattered forges lines the walls over molten slag hangs in midair, glowing faintly. The hum of broken enchantments never stops.

north.description: The collapse gallery lies back north.

east.description: A guard hall stretches east under cracked arches.

south.description: A narrow stair descends south.

west.description: The shattered drill hall lies to the west.

30018.name: Hall of the Fractured Vanguard
30018.description: An iron dais rises from the center over banners of the imperial vanguard hang in tattered arcs. Heavy footsteps echo here with deliberate intent.

north.description: The gravemark stairs rise back north.

south.description: A dark vault drops south into the choir hall.

west.description: The riftforge gallery lies to the west.

30019.name: Inner Ward - Tactics Chamber
30019.description: A shattered war table spans the room over floating map shards trace routes through impossible terrain. The air smells of cold steel.

north.description: The rifted hall lies back north.

south.description: A narrow stair descends south into the throne approach.

west.description: The vanguard hall opens to the west.

30020.name: Inner Ward - Riftguard Bastion
30020.description: Dark stone buttresses brace the ceiling over a ring of sigils rotates without sound. The atmosphere feels tightly controlled and oppressive.

north.description: The rupture armory lies back north.

south.description: A steep stair descends south into a fractured nave.

west.description: The tactics chamber lies to the west.

30021.name: Inner Ward - Broken Oath Corridor
30021.description: A narrow corridor is etched with snapped oaths over the floor is inlaid with shattered seals. Every step stirs a low, regretful hum.

north.description: The broken bastion lies back north.

east.description: The corridor continues east toward the throne complex.

south.description: A narrow stair descends south.

west.description: The riftguard bastion lies to the west.

30022.name: Inner Ward - Nullward Landing
30022.description: A landing of black glass overlooks a deep shaft over the light here bends, flattening colors into gray. The silence is heavy and complete.

north.description: The riftguard steps lie back north.

south.description: A darkened stair drops south into the throne approach.

west.description: The broken oath corridor lies to the west.

30023.name: Inner Ward - Riftlight Bridge
30023.description: A thin bridge of light spans a split in the keep over each step sends ripples across the air. The far side shimmers with cold resolve.

north.description: The breachpoint lies back north.

south.description: The bridge descends south into the throne antechamber.

west.description: The nullward landing lies to the west.

30024.name: Throne Approach - Splintered Nave
30024.description: A nave of cracked pillars stretches onward over fractured mosaics depict a coronation torn into pieces. The air tastes of lightning and ash.

north.description: The shattered drill hall lies back north.

south.description: A grand stair descends south into the inner sanctum.

30025.name: Throne Approach - Echoed Crossing
30025.description: A crossing of broken arches shivers with phantom voices over each step echoes twice, once forward and once behind. The light here bends strangely.

north.description: The riftforge gallery lies back north.

east.description: A dark choir hall opens east.

south.description: A fractured stair drops south toward the throne.

west.description: The splintered nave lies to the west.

30026.name: Choir of the Rifted Hymn
30026.description: A circle of cracked choir stalls faces a shattered pulpit over notes hang in the air like glass shards, singing without voices. A chill settles in your bones.

north.description: The vanguard hall lies back north.

south.description: A dark passage descends south into the sanctum.

west.description: The echoed crossing lies to the west.

30027.name: Throne Approach - Rifted Arcade
30027.description: A high arcade is split by a vertical tear over stone fragments hover like beads on invisible strings. A low chant reverberates from deeper within.

north.description: The tactics chamber lies back north.

south.description: A wide stair descends south into the throne wing.

west.description: The choir hall lies to the west.

30028.name: Throne Approach - Fracture Nave
30028.description: Pillars here are split into multiple offsets over each slice of stone casts a different shadow. The air thrums with restrained power.

north.description: The riftguard bastion lies back north.

south.description: A stair descends south into the throne antechamber.

west.description: The rifted arcade lies to the west.

30029.name: Throne Approach - Broken Oath Hall
30029.description: An oath hall lies in ruin over broken sigils drip with faint light, each one half-erased. The air is heavy with lingering judgment.

north.description: The broken oath corridor lies back north.

south.description: A steep stair descends south into the throne wing.

west.description: The fracture nave lies to the west.

30030.name: Throne Approach - Nullward Gallery
30030.description: A gallery of black glass stretches onward over reflections show a throne that is not here. The sound of your heartbeat seems delayed.

north.description: The nullward landing lies back north.

east.description: The gallery continues east toward a luminous gate.

south.description: A dark stair descends south into the inner sanctum.

west.description: The broken oath hall lies to the west.

30031.name: Throne Approach - Shattergate
30031.description: A gate of split crystal stands ahead over a pale light spills through like a blade. The silence here is thick and expectant.

north.description: The riftlight bridge lies back north.

south.description: The shattergate opens south into the throne chamber.

west.description: The nullward gallery lies to the west.

30032.name: Sanctum - Splintered Dais
30032.description: A fractured dais rises from a black floor over shards of a throne float above it, glittering with cold light. The air smells of burning oathstone.

north.description: The splintered nave lies back north.

east.description: A narrow passage leads east around the dais.

south.description: A silent stair descends south into the throne chamber.

30033.name: Sanctum - Rifted Procession
30033.description: A processional hall is split into layered slices over each layer shows a different moment of imperial glory. The walls hum with latent power.

north.description: The echoed crossing lies back north.

south.description: A broken arch descends south into the throne chamber.

west.description: The splintered dais lies to the west.

30034.name: Sanctum - Choir Vault
30034.description: A vaulted chamber rings with a silent hymn over shattered crystal pipes line the walls, each one vibrating faintly. Frost coats every surface.

north.description: The rifted choir lies back north.

south.description: A shattered stair drops south into the throne chamber.

west.description: The rifted procession lies to the west.

30035.name: Sanctum - Fracture Walk
30035.description: A narrow walkway runs along a chasm of broken reality over the edges glow with violet fire that never burns out. The air crackles with energy.

north.description: The rifted arcade lies back north.

south.description: A slanted stair descends south into the throne chamber.

west.description: The choir vault lies to the west.

30036.name: Sanctum - Riftguard Gallery
30036.description: A gallery of shattered shields lines the walls over each shield reflects a different sky. The room feels anchored by heavy warding.

north.description: The fracture nave lies back north.

south.description: A broad stair descends south into the throne chamber.

west.description: The fracture walk lies to the west.

30037.name: Sanctum - Oathbreaker Passage
30037.description: A tight passage is lined with snapped oathstones over the stones pulse like slow heartbeats, then fade. The air tastes of cold iron.

north.description: The broken oath hall lies back north.

east.description: The passage continues east toward a darkened gate.

south.description: A narrow stair descends south into the throne chamber.

west.description: The riftguard gallery lies to the west.

30038.name: Sanctum - Silent Gate
30038.description: A silent gate stands before the throne room over the air here is perfectly still, as if the world itself is holding its breath. Cold light spills from the seam.

north.description: The nullward gallery lies back north.

south.description: The silent gate opens south into the throne chamber.

west.description: The oathbreaker passage lies to the west.

30039.name: The Shattered Throne
30039.description: A throne of split obsidian floats above a chasm over its fragments orbit a hollow core that drinks all light. Reality bends here, and the air vibrates with imperial fury.

north.description: The shattergate lies back to the north.

30001.name: imperial bulwark
30001.long_desc: An imperial bulwark braces its shield against the broken hall.
30001.description: A towering guardian in shattered plate, it holds the line with unyielding force.

30002.name: rift arcanist
30002.long_desc: A rift arcanist bends the air with a crackling sigil.
30002.description: Robed in fractured starlight, the arcanist tears at the seams of reality.

30003.name: throne confessor
30003.long_desc: A throne confessor murmurs a broken litany over the ruins.
30003.description: Clad in cracked ceremonial robes, the confessor radiates a chilling devotion.

30004.name: fractureblade stalker
30004.long_desc: A fractureblade stalker glides between the shards in silence.
30004.description: A lean assassin of black glass, it strikes from impossible angles.

30005.name: reality mauler
30005.long_desc: A reality mauler drags a fractured hammer through the rubble.
30005.description: Its hammerhead flickers with voidlight, leaving afterimages in the air.

30006.name: null-ward sentinel
30006.long_desc: A null-ward sentinel stands unmoving, its eyes cold.
30006.description: A guardian of star-metal wards, it hums with suppressive power.

30007.name: riftbound cantor
30007.long_desc: A riftbound cantor intones a fractured hymn under its breath.
30007.description: A spectral cantor whose voice twists magic into jagged shards.

30008.name: riftwarden juggernaut
30008.long_desc: A riftwarden juggernaut heaves a shield the size of a door.
30008.description: A living bulwark forged in a broken oath, it blocks the path with brutal resolve.

30015.name: marshal Kyrell
30015.long_desc: Marshal Kyrell stands atop a fractured dais, shield raised.
30015.description: The fractured vanguard marshal radiates iron discipline and unbroken wrath.

30016.name: choir-matron Serathis
30016.long_desc: Choir-Matron Serathis hovers above the shattered choir, singing.
30016.description: A fractured hymnist of the throne, her song mends allies and shreds foes.

30017.name: shatterblade Veyl
30017.long_desc: Shatterblade Veyl appears in a flicker of broken light.
30017.description: A killer of the shattered court, Veyl strikes from the rifts between moments.

30020.name: shattered emperor
30020.long_desc: The Shattered Emperor rises from the broken throne, haloed in voidlight.
30020.description: A sovereign of broken reality, armored in fractured obsidian and imperial wrath.

30050.name: Thronebreaker Greatsword
30050.room_desc: A colossal greatsword rests here, its blade split with violet light.

30051.name: Imperial Lumenblade
30051.room_desc: A radiant longsword burns with a fractured halo of light.

30052.name: Aegis of the Fractured Oath
30052.short_desc: the Aegis of the Fractured Oath
30052.room_desc: A shield of split obsidian hums with a low, steady ward.

30053.name: Riftweaver Staff
30053.room_desc: A staff of black crystal crackles with caged lightning.

30054.name: Gravebound Scepter
30054.room_desc: A scepter of dark bone rests here, pulsing with cold power.

30055.name: Stormrend Longbow
30055.room_desc: A longbow of storm-wrought sinew hums with power.

30056.name: Veilripper Dirk
30056.room_desc: A slim dirk of violet glass lies here, its edge humming.

30057.name: Voidglass Kris
30057.room_desc: A jagged kris of black glass reflects no light.

30058.name: Hymn of Shattered Strings
30058.room_desc: A crystalline lute hums with a fractured, haunting chord.

30059.name: Crown of the Shattered Throne
30059.short_desc: the Crown of the Shattered Throne
30059.room_desc: A jagged crown of obsidian floats here, rimmed in voidlight.

30060.name: Mantle of Tearing Realities
30060.room_desc: A mantle of split velvet ripples without wind.

30061.name: Imperial Fractureplate
30061.room_desc: A massive breastplate of split star-metal rests here.

30062.name: Gauntlets of the Riftguard
30062.room_desc: A pair of black gauntlets glows with suppressed energy.

30063.name: Boots of the Broken March
30063.short_desc: the Boots of the Broken March
30063.room_desc: Heavy boots of cracked leather stand in quiet defiance.

30064.name: Emperor's Hollow Signet
30064.room_desc: A black signet ring rests here, its seal cracked down the center.

30065.name: Shard of the Shattered Throne
30065.short_desc: the Shard of the Shattered Throne
30065.room_desc: A shard of obsidian floats here, drinking the light around it.
